resources.string: \ \ Marine Science: What do you know?
What percent of the planet earth\'s living space is ocean?
At what speed do penguins \"fly\" underwater?
Coral has been used for what medical purpose?
To replace bone grafts to heal human bones
Ingredients for medicines to strengthen bones
In which ocean creature do the males give birth?
Which ocean creature does not have blood in there body and digest their food outside of their bodies?
Which ocean creature has the ability to see ultraviolet and infrared light?

Thank you for completing the Marine Science Quiz! The answers are: 
 99% percent of the planet earth's living space is ocean! Depth and width is factored in to this calculation. 
 Penguins "fly" underwater at 25 mph! That is pretty fast!! 
 Coral has been used to replace bone grafts to heal human bones! Unbelievable!! 
 The seahorse males give birth, not the female! Fascinating!! 
 Starfish do not have blood in there body and digest their food outside of their bodies! 
 The goldfish has the ability to see ultraviolet and infrared light! 
 What an amazing world we live in! Please take care of it!
